author: daxian-dbw
body:
There are 3 sub-issues in 'docs/testing-guidelines/testing-guidelines.md':
- [ ] test run examples are using non-existing test paths
  
  > Start-PSPester -Directory test/powershell/engine/Api 
  > Start-PSPester -Directory test/powershell/engine/Api -Test XmlAdapter.Tests.Api 
- [ ] test layout at the end of the doc needs to be updated as the test folder has been changed
  
  ```
  > The current layout of tests is: 
  >   test/powershell/engine 
  ```
- [ ] in **Test Layout** section, the following sentence is not clear enough and needs to be updated
  
  ```
  > If you are unsure, you can make it part of your PR, or create an issue.  
  ```
